errors.no_connection: Could not fetch statistics, please check your API credentials.

site_id.label: Website ID
site_id.help: The website ID of this Flarum instance on Umami. You can find this in the details of the website settings on Umami.

domain.label: Domain
domain.help: The domain where Umami is located.

username.label: Account username
username.help: Optional. The username of an umami account on the above domain. (used for the admin dashboard widget)

password.label: Account password
password.help: Optional. The password of the username above. (used for the admin dashboard widget)
